SPECIFICATIONS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#ffffff” width=”70vw” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”40px|||-30vw||” custom_margin_tablet=”30px|||0vw” custom_margin_phone=”0px||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”60px|50px|70px|50px|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|40px|50px|40px|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” background_last_edited=”on|phone” background_enable_color_phone=”off” box_shadow_style=”preset2″ box_shadow_vertical=”28px” box_shadow_blur=”40px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.1)” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column_inner saved_specialty_column_type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

ENGINE   
Model & Type Indo Farm; Four Cylinder, Water Cooled Diesel Engine Rated power 85 hp max @2200 rpm.
TRANSMISSION   
Type Heavy duty constant mesh transmission for crane application. Eight forward and two reverse speeds with high and low selector.
Speed (Top) 30 kmph.
Clutch Single plate, heavy duty dry friction type clutch plate especially designed for crane application.
STEERING   
Type Articulated power steering, hydraulically controlled through two double acting hydraulic cylinders.
Articulation upto 53°
Turning Radius 7.2 m
OPERATING TIMING   
Steering (lock to lock) 9-11 Secs
Boom Raising 22-25 Secs
Boom Lowering 13-16 Secs
Telescoping Extension in 9-12 Secs
Telescoping Extension out 17-20 Secs
Hoist Line Speed 55 m/min. (Single Line)
BRAKES   
Front wheel Fully air operated ‘S’ cam dual circuit brakes.
Rear wheel Mechanical wet disc brakes, actuated through pneumatic brake chamber.
Parking Air operated fail safe brakes on front wheels.
TRACKS   
Front 2105 mm (center of twin wheels)
Rear 1630 mm (center of twin wheels)
TYRES   
Front 12.00×20 – 18 PR (4 Nos.)
Rear 14.00×25 – 20 PR (2 Nos.)
BOOM   
Telescoping 2 part hydraulically powered
Derricking Through two double acting cylinders.
HOIST MECHANISM   
Hoist Eight falls with fail safe brake.
HYDRAULIC SYSTEM   
Pump Vane type hydraulic pump.
Control Valve 4 spool control valve with built in pressure relief valve for trouble free operation.
Hydraulic Filter Suction line has a 100 mesh inline strainer while return line has 25 micron full flow filter.
ELECTRICAL SYSTEM   
Type 12V Single battery negative earth.
CAPACITY   
Fuel 60 Litres
Hydraulic 155 Litre
Engine oil 12 Litres
Gear oil 55 Litres
OPERATING WEIGHT 14400 Kg

[/et_pb_code][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.indofarm.in/brochure/crane/Indo_Power_25T_Mining%20Master.pdf” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Download Brochure” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291″ custom_margin=”25px||25px||true|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291%22:%91%22button_text_color%22%93}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||2px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”50px|0px|50px|15px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_css_main_element__hover_enabled=”off|desktop”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”2caebda7-1c6a-4d05-9d5d-92ad76e16d75″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#21B354″ header_font_size=”3rem” header_letter_spacing=”5px” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”1.5rem” header_2_line_height=”2.5rem” header_3_font_size=”3rem” background_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”10%||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”10%||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”3rem” header_font_size_phone=”2rem” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_letter_spacing_tablet=”5px” header_letter_spacing_phone=”3px” header_letter_spacing_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

<title>INDO POWER 25T MINING MASTER | Indo Farm</title>
<meta name="description" content="This limitless crane is the king of Mines with a load capacity of 25T. Capable of doing almost all the heavy work in mining with the least turning radius." />

<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="INDO POWER 25T MINING MASTER | Indo Farm" />
